bug.author: yuhaimahaiyin
bug.description: it always give error:"no such target '//:inception/download_and_preprocess_imagenet': target 'inception/download_and_preprocess_imagenet' not declared in package '' defined by /home/hank/tensorflow/BUILD." the BUILD file is empty.

comments.comment: It looks like the inception model docs are out of date. We would gladly welcome contributions improving the documentation. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/models/tree/master/inception>https://github.com/tensorflow/models/tree/master/inception</denchmark-link>
On second thought, let me take care of this for you.

Thanks a lot. I have figured it out, i built in a wrong folder. :(
bst rgds <denchmark-link:#>…</denchmark-link>
在 2017年5月27日，14:07，Justine Tunney ***@***.***> 写道：
On second thought, let me take care of this for you.
— You are receiving this because you authored the thread. Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub, or mute the thread.

I had a feeling people might get confused by that. The good news is that, thanks to you, no one will experience that same pain in the future. I added statements to all the README examples in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/models/pull/1510>tensorflow/models#1510</denchmark-link> .
